physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated total bilirubin and mild leukocytosis. Blood pressure unequal in both arms (140 in one arm, 170s in another).

General: Alert, oriented, no acute distress. Abdomen: soft, mild diffuse tenderness that refers to the epigastrium, non-distended, hypoactive bowel sounds, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly.
